attributes.action: authorise use of all available drugs to combat age related macular degeneration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current proposals by NICE to only authorise restricted treatment after the loss of sight in one eye is barbaric.People who may or may not be healthy in other respects could be condemned to life without their sight - surely this is unacceptable for a civilised society.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "authorise use of all available drugs to combat age related macular degeneration."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
